article_title: What Happens When Roger Federer Tweets Praise of Olympians

article_metadata.description: Following Dario Cologna's gold medal win in the skiathlon this morning, Roger Federer sent his fellow Swiss countryman a nod of congratulations on Twitter. Some of the responses to Federer were incredible.

article_summary:
— Klara (@FeddyBeaar) February 9, 2014@rogerfederer You're cute too.
Federer also showed some love for the Dufour-Lapointe sisters, two of whom struck gold and silver respectively in the ladies' moguls yesterday.
As we mentioned in the Sochi live blog, following Dario Cologna's gold medal win in the 30-kilometer skiathlon this morning, tennis great and fellow Olympian Roger Federer sent his fellow Swiss countryman a nod of congratulations on Twitter.
<3 — Federer's angels (@fedangels1) February 9, 2014But one response to Federer's tweet about Cologna was too incredible to go unmentioned.
roger on twitter fills me with life RT @rogerfederer: So cute, sport is great pic.twitter.com/Loo44OFIO5 — kathryn (@kratlee) February 9, 2014Some of the Federer-themed Twitter accounts were happy about that.
